column1: At night the alarm roused him from a deep sleep. Even the worst will beat his low score.
Jerk the cord, and out tumbles the gold. Wood is best for making toys and blocks.
A saw is a tool used for making boards. They sang the same tunes at each party.
Sunday is the best part of the week. The room was crowded with a wild mob.
Dimes showered down from all sides. The office paint was a dull sad tan.
The man went to the woods to gather sticks. He picked up the dice for a second roll.
Coax a young calf to drink from a bucket. The little tales they tell are false.
Wake and rise, and step into the green outdoors. The girl at the booth sold fifty bonds.
